title: MOD Pizza with Cody Ziglar
itunes:title: MOD Pizza with Cody Ziglar
description:
Cody Ziglar (Rick and Morty, Marvel) joins the 'boys to discuss pescatarian eats and air fried food before a review of MOD Pizza. Plus, the debut of Cake It Off.

Sources for this week's intro:

https://www.kingarthurbaking.com/about/history https://www.kingarthurbaking.com/blog/2013/09/10/how-did-king-arthur-flour-get-its-name https://moneyinc.com/mod-pizza/ https://www.nrn.com/nrn-50/breakout-brands-mod-pizza https://pizzatoday.com/pizzeria-rankings/2018-top-100-pizza-companies/ https://modpizza.com/we-are-mod/

Want more Doughboys? Check out our Patreon!: https://patreon.com/doughboys
